General.Name: Oronova Energy Inc
General.Description: Oronova Energy Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of oil and gas projects. The company was formerly known as Oronova Resource Corp. and changed its name to Oronova Energy Inc. in December 2016. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 700 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1B3
